parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value>arma1

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1 </name>=<value> Camera Control

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets camera focus range in format [distance, blur]. blur param - sets the camera focus blur. It does not automatically commit changes (see [[camCommit]]). Use [-1, -1] to disable focus completely.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> camera '''camSetFocus''' focusRange

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> camera: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> focusRange: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_camera [[camSetFocus]] [50, 1];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[camCreate]], [[camCommand]], [[camDestroy]], [[camCommit]], [[camPrepareFocus]]
</value></part></template>
